execerm.title: Execute Erm Commands [avoid changes to v1, z1, s, t, F1 and F2]
execerm.legend: Enter an ERM command (start without !! but end with ;).
execerm.legend2: Enter another ERM command (leave empty to skip).
execerm.error:
ERM command has a wrong syntax. Skipped.

@error@

trainer.wrongName: We coudn't locate this hero. Maybe the name is wrong?
trainer.noHero: You have no hero. Recruit one and then retry!
trainer.legendMain: Enter the hero's name or number (leave empty for heroes of current player).
trainer.learnAllSp: Do you wish to teach @hero@ all the spells?
trainer.forgetAllSp: Do you wish @hero@ to forget all the spells?
trainer.heroLvReset: Do you want @hero@ to be reset to level 1 and forget all the skills?
trainer.titleAddMon: How many @monName@ (#@mon@) do you want to give to @hero@?
trainer.legendAddMon: Enter a number of creatures to give.
trainer.titleCustMon: Give a stack of creatures to @hero@.
trainer.legendCustMon: Enter a creature number (0..@max@) or a full creature name.
trainer.noMon: That doesn't sound like any creature we know! Try another one?
trainer.legendScroll: Enter a spell number (0..@max@) or a full spell name.
trainer.noScroll: That doesn't sound like any spell we know! Try another one?
trainer.legendCustArt: Enter an artifact number (0..@max@) or a full artifact name.
trainer.noArt: That doesn't sound like any artifact we know! Try another one?
trainer.titleMovement:
How much movement do you want to give to @hero@?

Current movement points: @movement@
trainer.legendMovement: Enter a number of bonus tiles (set to 0 by entering 0 or decrease with negative).
trainer.titleMana:
How many spell points do you want to give to @hero@?

Current spell points: @mana@
trainer.legendMana: Enter a number of bonus spell points (set to 0 by entering 0 or decrease with negative).
trainer.hintRank: Click to change the rank of this stack.
trainer.legendMonQty: Enter a number of creatures (0 will remove the whole stack).
trainer.hintMonQty: Click to change the quantity of this stack.
trainer.help:
{~text align=center}INFO SECTION{~}

{~Cyan}Learn spells{~}: browse the magic schools, then select the spells you like to teach the hero. Once you have done selected spells, click on the book button to learn them.
Clicking on the eye button will remove all spells from the hero.

{~Cyan}Learn secondary skills{~}: left click on any skill to change it to any level.

{~Cyan}Give artifacts{~}: browse artifacts using the arrows then left-click to pass them to the hero. The artifacts that the hero has already got are highlighted.

{~Cyan}Give creatures{~}: browse the different factions then click on the creature you wish to pass to the hero's army.

{~Cyan}Increase creatures number{~}:use the arrow buttons then enter the value you wish.

{~Cyan}Get resources{~}: left click on the resources graphics to display a dialogue, then enter the new value.

{~Cyan}Give primary skills{~}: click on the various buttons.

{~Cyan}Change Level{~}: click on experience button to change the hero's level. He will level up as soon as you close the dialog. If you click on experience icon, you can choose to reset all levels and forget all skills.

{~Cyan}Reveal map{~}: click on the spyglass button.

{~Cyan}Give extra movement{~}: click on corresponding button.

{~Cyan}Give mana{~}: click on corresponding button.

{~Cyan}Commander screen{~}: you can change the type of commander, change the commander's primary skills and artifacts.
trainer.cmdRmvArt: Remove this artifact from the commander? Warning: Incremental bonuses (if any) will be LOST!
trainer.cmdTitleArt:
Change how many times of vicotry @art@ has achieved.

Current victory: @victory@
trainer.titleCmdLv: Change the level of the commander.
trainer.titleHenchExp:
Give battle experience to the henchman.

Current battle experience: @exp@
trainer.legendHenchExp: Enter a number of experience (0 to empty or negative to decrease).
trainer.objOn: Enabled Objects/Events/Hero modifications (Right-click on any object)
trainer.objTitle:
Select an action for the clicked object.
Alt-click to repeat the last action. Alt+num keys to change options.
Disable this menu by pressing F3.
trainer.legendMoveHero: Enter the hero's name or number (leave empty for heroes of current player).
trainer.objTelptNoHero: You have no hero to teleport with! Where did you hide them?
trainer.objTelptInvalidHero: Unfortunately, this hero cannot be teleported.
trainer.titleOwnerHero:
Choose a new owner for @object@.

Note: Only works if new owner has fewer than 8 active heroes
trainer.titleAnyObj: Place any object (Warning: some may be buggy)
trainer.legendAnyObj: Enter with this format "type/subtype" (leave empty to use the last object)
trainer.notSupportedObj: This type of objects is not supported!
trainer.tooManyObj: Can't place more of this obejct.
trainer.titleAdd:
Additional Cheats

Select a feature you would like to use.
trainer.titleDate: Change the date of the game.

sechen.ai: Second Henchmen Cheats for AI players are not supported.
sechen.title: Second Henchmen Cheats
sechen.fixedAbilities: Duplicated and invalid abilities have been removed.
sechen.lvTitle:
Change the level of the second henchman.

Warning: This will set the level of your second henchman without showing level up dialogue.
sechen.asmMonLegend: The stats of the second henchman are directly related to the stats of the assimilation monster.
